orbiteye.title: OrbitEye
orbiteye.description: An educational visualization of orbital satellite data. Built in React with D3 and ThreeJS for a class project at KTH.

mm27.title: MechMania 27
mm27.description: Visualizer built in the Godot game engine for MechMania 27, an AI hackathon.

fluid-sim.title: WebGL Fluid Simulation
fluid-sim.description: A fluid simulation built with WebGL shaders. Accompanied by a written guide and intended as an introductory project for SIGGRAPH students.

webgl-path-tracer.title: WebGL Path Tracer
webgl-path-tracer.description: A path tracer built with WebGL shaders. Created as part of a course project following Pete Shirley's Ray Tracing in One Weekend.

391OS.title: 391OS Custom Kernel
391OS.description: A custom kernel written in C for UIUC's ECE 391 course. Supports multiple terminals and scheduling.

mm26.title: MechMania 26
mm26.description: The game engine for MechMania 26, the first year with a continuous-style MMO game.

ece385.title: Lurking in the Dark
ece385.description: A SystemVerilog design for a basic graphics accelerator paired with a C++ recreation of the game Lurking in the Dark made to run on an FPGA.

bahai-game.title: Interactive Fiction
bahai-game.description: A text-based video game that takes the player through the history of the founding of the Baha'i temple in Willmette, Illinois.

mm25.title: MechMania 25
mm25.description: A turn-based multi-character strategy battler built in Java, and my first Mech Mania game engine.

nokia-robotics.title: Nokia Intern Robotics
nokia-robotics.description: An expansion of the BOEBot kit made to clear challenges set out by the competition runners at Nokia.

ece120-honors.title: ECE 120 Honors Project
ece120-honors.description: A breadboard circuit using an Arduino, a keypad, an RFID scanner, an LCD screen, and basic logic gates to create a simple security system.

mm24.title: MechMania 24
mm24.description: A simple bot built to compete in MechMania 24: Rock Paper Scissors. Uses manually set weights and biases to choose a strategy.

nhs-website.title: NHS Website
nhs-website.description: A website built for my local NHS chapter. Uses an SQL database to keep track of volunteer hours and enable quick and easy sign ups.

foodle.title: Foodle
foodle.description: A website built for my first hackathon. Mimics collaborative filtering algorithms to find recommended recipes based on your history and friends.
